name: Number Converter
short_description: numcv is a Free Source project (GNU GPL) being developed in C as a quick reference conversion tool for developers. numcv is a program for converting numbers, such as Decimal to Binary to Hex to Octal to ASCII, and other common standards conversions. FAST
